name: Saucy Beefed-Up Power Bowl
preparation: In a Round or Multipurpose Steamer, add rice and water; microwave on high for 8–10 min.
While rice is cooking, place eggs in medium saucepan; cover with water and cook on high heat until water is boiling. Add lid and turn off heat; let eggs sit 10 min.
While eggs are cooking, whisk together brown sugar, soy sauce, Asian Stir Fry Seasoning, sesame oil, and sriracha (if desired) in a small bowl.
In a large saucepan or Wok, add oil and ground beef and cook over medium-high heat for 3–5 min. Add 1⁄2 of sauce and cook mixture for an additional 2 min. Set aside.
Run eggs under cold water; peel and half each egg.
In the same large saucepan or wok, add spinach and remaining sauce; stir-fry for 2–3 min, until spinach is wilted.
In 4 serving bowls, arrange rice, beef mixture, spinach mixture, sliced bell peppers, and egg halves. Garnish each bowl with sliced green onion and sesame seeds, if desired. Enjoy!

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
